title: Full Stack Developer (Ruby)
description: We are looking for a Full Stack Developer who is able to build single page applications including implementing, testing, integrating and utilizing APIs with latest front-end web technologies.
requirements:
Have at least one year experience. We pay according to the level they perform: 1,000 to 4,000 USD. A smart 22 years old can get hired.

- Languages: being efficient in any of the following languages: Ruby, JavaScript
- Framework: strong experience in modern web technologies such as Ruby on Rails, NodeJS, React
- Database: relevant experience with relational databases such as MySQL or PostgreSQL
- Test coverage: competent skills in test automation (unit test, and integration test)
- Platform: adequate knowledge of Continuous Integration and web application deployment
